1.content:
It is said that all dark and evil things must take place at night, in order to avoid the power of the sun defending against evil. Well, that is not true at all, but doing dark stuff at night just has the right atmosphere.

As cliche as it was, it was in fact a dark and stormy night, but the winds were mostly calm in the forest where Marie was. It was a sight, a teenage girl, almost boringly average in most respects such as hair, figure, and clothing, alone in the forest at night with a stormy background. The only odd thing about her was the dirty and beat up sack she carried on her back. Many would say that she was incredibly unsafe right then. But Marie would disagree, she had never felt more safe.

Soon, she stumbled upon the tree that she had heard about, an old willow that would seem more at home at a swamp than the forest right outside of town. The bark was full and black, leaves were a color in between jungle green and hospital gray.

Marie took out a straw doll, with a face too dark to see. She held it up to the tree, and then with a mallet and nail produced from her bag, started to drive it into the tree.

*Whack* *Whack* *WHACK*

On the third strike the doll was stuck to the tree. On the other side of town, Adam was startled awake, by a pain in his heart, accompanied by the crash of thunder. Almost instantly, the pain went away and he collapsed back to sleep.

Back at the tree, Marie took out an identical second doll, and what she did with it right then is unknown to everyone except her and the willow tree.

As you got back to your apartment, you locked the door behind you, threw off your shoes and just collapsed face first into the couch.
Your newly acquired boobs against the cushions and your hair going all over the place.
"Geech, what a mess" you said to yourself as you rolled over, removing some hair from your eyes in the process.

"This was a sight to get used to", you thought, looking down at your denim covered legs as you shifted upright into a more comfortable position.

Let's look at the facts here. You're a girl. You know who's responsible. You have no idea of how, if, or when you will return back to normal. Emma knows what has happened. She's gonna let Olivia in on it. One of your best guy-friends is soon gonna be on his way to your apartment expecting to find you (the normal you) lying in your bed with a fever or something. Somehow you also agreed to let the girls help you adjust to all of this.
121122112211121121111222222112.title: You went inside

choices: It was the rest of the guys
1211221122111211211112222221121.content:
You looked through the door hole. It was Jacob.
Why was he here already? School wasn't over for another couple of hours. Oh man, what were you going to do? There's no sick Adam at home. Just you. A strange girl who claims to be his girlfriend.

There was another knock on the door.
"Adam?" he called out. You could hear some other voices as well eminating down the stairs.
1211221122111211211112222221121.title: There was a knock on your door

choices: Had a freind who is male that knew too (You highly appreciate the thought)
Pretend to be boyfriend and girlfriend  (You don't like it)
12112211221112112111122222211212.content:
Jacob says though the letter box Adam I know it's you in there, Emma and Olivia told me what has happened and I'm here to help you.

You open the door and Jacob, Emma and Olivia walked into you're apartment and you all sat down and started talking.

You look at the girl's and ask, why did you tell Jacob? Because we thought it would be easier for you if You.....
12112211221112112111122222211212.title: It was Emma and Olivia

1211221122111211211112222221122.content:
You had dozed off. You jolted awake to your phone vibrating on the glass table next to the couch.
You picked the phone up.
1211221122111211211112222221122.title: Your phone is ringing

12112211221112112111122222211221.content:
You picked up the phone. It was Emma.
"Hey, Adam", she said.
Well that's a name that doesn't quite fit your current looks.

"Hey"
"Are you ready to go? We'll be there in a few minutes"
You looked at the clock, it was already three in the afternoon. You yawned.
"You tired?"
"I think I fell fell asleep", you said rather sleepily.

You heard another voice from the other line
"Who is it?" she said. It was Olivia's voice.
"It's Adam"

Emma's voice turned into a whisper. "I haven't told her yet. It all sounded so stupid when I tried to think of a way to bring it up"
"You what?!" you shouted.
"I just thought it would be a better idea to do this face to face"
"Emma, don't you think you're making this whole situation awkward enough for me? I'm a guy in high school, on my way to buy girl clothes"
*Sorry* she whispered, and hung up.

Well that's that. I'm dead.
12112211221112112111122222211221.title: It was Emma

121122112211121121111222222112212.content:
Less than five minutes later someone knocked on your door. It was them. To be honest, you had expected Jacob to arrive there before they did. Maybe if you could all head out before he got here you could avoid at least one unpleasant meeting.

You let the girls in.
"Oh hey" Olivia said as they stepped in. She had a puzzled look on her face. "Didn't I see you at school today this morning?" she said. You were ready to pull the lie that had become quite familiar with you these past couple of hours, that you were Adam's girlfriend and you just went there to pick up his books. Emma looked at you with an expression that obviously meant "Go on then, tell her".

You gave a nod as a late response to Olivia's question. "Let's sit down" said Emma, and made a gesture towards the couch. The three of you took a seat, Olivia looking a bit confused as to why Adam hadn't come to greet you yet. She filled in the awkward silence with "So I hear you're his girlfriend?"
"Where did you hear that?" you said. You were sitting awkwardly stale with your hands on your knees.
"He told me during lunch. He said you were there to pick up his books?"

Great. Jacob told her. If she knows, that means the guys know too.
You gave a silent nod. This really wasn't taking you anywhere.

"Wait, if Adam's too sick to go to school, why did he want to hang out?" she filled in. "Where is he, anyway?" She first looked at Emma, then at you, confused.
"He's over there, Olivia" Emma pointed at you.
"Wait, what?"
"Olivia, it's me." you said. "... I'm Adam"

She looked at you, grinning and said "Alright, what's the gag?"
Emma was looking serious, making Olivia's grin shift into confusion. "I'm not lying, Olivia. He seriously is Adam. I don't know how, but he just woke up like this."
"Emma, people don't just magically transform into the opposite sex. It's not possible. If this is a prank or something you're not doing a very good job."

"Fine" you said, sounding more confident in your voice as you stood up. "What would prove to you that I'm really me?" ... "Or well, Adam."
"Well first off, how did you say it happened?"

You and Emma looked at each other. "It was Marie", Emma said. You continued. "I just woke up like this. I have no idea what's going on and it's freaking me out."
There was a slight tremble in your voice. She took her eyes off you and looked at Emma. "What do you mean it was Marie?"
"I overheard them talking in the hallway. I don't know the specifics, but I heard her say it was her."
"But why?"
"Apparently, it's some sort of sick payback just because I dumped her" you said, crossing your arms.

Olivia raised her arms to the two of you as a sign to be quiet. "Okay, let's - for the sake of this conversation say that what you're saying is true-" she paused. "Can she change you back?" Your arms fell to your sides. You looked down at your female body, the long hair falling into your eyes as you did. "I'm not sure, but I think so."

"I still need more proof." she said looking torn between whether to believe it or not. "Hey girl-Adam, say something only you would know."
This was like the conversation with Emma in the girl's bathroom all over again. You thought for a second, then said "You have a crush on Dan."

Olivia's face went stale. "You like Dan?", Emma said shocked. "I.. haven't told anyone about that aside from Adam." She walked over and looked at you closely. You shifted your head a bit in confusion.
Her eyes widened. "Holy cow! Adam?"
121122112211121121111222222112212.title: The girls arrived

choices: You met the guys on the way
1211221122111211211112222221122121.content:
She touched your face. "You're a girl!"
".. Yes, I know that" you replied, slightly annoyed.
"So wait, what are we doing here, Emma?" she looked back across the room. "I thought we were going shopping with Adam?"
"We are" she replied, grinning. "Who knows how long he'll stay like this. He can't stay a girl with only one outfit that, for the record, belongs to his sister who can come by and pick it up any day"

Olivia started laughing, wholeheartedly. "So we're taking him out buying girl clothes?"
You grimaced. She was finding this whole thing way more entertaining than you did.
"Yes" Emma replied.

You became serious for a second. "You won't tell anybody about this though, right?"
"Mums the word" she said, mimicking zipping her lips shut. "Who else knows?"
"Only the two of you. Aside from Marie, that is. Given that she hasn't told anyone"

You sat down, hands rubbing your eyes. "This is just all so messed up"
Olivia slapped you on the back, still grinning. "Don't worry, you'll love being a girl! You're one of us now, Adam!"

"By the way-" Emma pointed matter-of-factly. "You need a better name than Adam if you want to fool anyone"
"I said something to Jacob the other day when he called, but I don't even remember what it was."
"We'll help you come up with something. Let's just go before he and perhaps the other guys get here with your books."
"Wait, how am I supposed to get my backpack and stuff back if I'm not here?"
"How are you going to explain the absence of Adam if you are? Just leave a note on the door or something saying he can hang the backpack on the handle."

You can't believe you never thought about that. "Okay, are you ready to go?" Olivia said.
"As ready as I'll ever be, I suppose." you said and got up. You pulled up your jeans as you did.

"Falling down are they?" she teased.
"Shut up" you said as you grabbed your stuff and walked out.
1211221122111211211112222221122121.title: Continue

12112211221112112111122222211221211.content:
As you were making your way into town, Olivia began talking. She's always been pretty spunky and outgoing and was clearly seeing something funny in this whole situation you obviously missed.
"So, what's it like?" she said as she smiled at you, not mockingly, but friendly.
"Mh?" you said.
"You know what I mean. Being a girl. What's it like?"
Emma looked up, smiling. She was looking interested as well. You hadn't gotten a chance to talk to her much during school, so she hadn't asked much.

"Uh.. It's. Smoother. And hairier at the same time", you said, spitting out a few strands of hair that got in your mouth as you were all hit by a warm breeze.

It was late summer. The grass and leaves still green and the sun did a good job keeping it warm. It felt different walking. It was hard to explain, but there was a sort of sway to your hips that was unaccustomed to you and the sensation of your tight clothes made every movement more noticable.

"Not gonna lie, it feels pretty weird" you said. Emma nudged you. "What about your added package?" she said, giggling.
"My boobs?"
"Yes"
"Oh come on, he's a guy" Olivia responded. "Of course he likes it."
Emma looked at you. "Do you though? Are you still into girls?"
"Yes. Or well, at least I guess so. It's just so odd seeing it from this point of view" you said. All these questions. Some of them you hadn't even had time to process yourself.

"What about the.. other parts then?" her gaze shifted downwards. "Hahah, come on, that's gotta be more comfortable." Emma filled in.
"Well, there's nothing in the way at least" you started. "It feels really odd, as if I keep expecting to feel something that isn't there. Slightly freaks me out everytime I sit down or lie down on my stomach"

The girls laughed.
"I've never understood how boys can stand having something dangling there 24/7" said Emma."I know, right? Though I'd totally be a guy for a day if I could" Olivia added. "You'd probably freak out just as much as I am right now"
"Don't worry, Adam. We'll help you be the best girl you possibly can."
"That's what worries me" you muttered.
12112211221112112111122222211221211.title: On your way

choices: They got back with a pile of clothes
You met someone while you were waiting
121122112211121121111222222112212111.content:
The three of you went into a clothing store, walked past the lines of men's clothes into the girl section. It felt as if you didn't belong here and that any second now someone from school would pop out and shout "Hey guys, check it out! Jenkins is here bra-shopping!"
No one did however. Nobody suspected you had ever been a boy.

Emma and Olivia were a few feet away, browsing various items neatly folded and put on display. You weren't really doing anything. Just standing there, arms folded under your boobs, as if waiting for orders. It appeared as if the girls were looking for stuff for themselves as well. They were rummaging different items of clothing, laughing and talking to each other. How can they not find this extremely boring?

You sat down on the edge of a table, moving some jeans and stuff aside. "So now what?" you finally asked.
"Well, what are you looking for?" Emma said. She put her hair behind her ear as she looked up.
"I have no idea what I'm even doing here" you said. "This was all your idea"
"Relax, you're in good hands" Olivia came back from around the corner and dropped a few tops on the table you were sitting on. "Do you know what size you have?"
"No, measuring my waistline hasn't really been a top priority for me these past two days" you said sarcastically.

"Well you don't look much bigger than Emma. We'll go pick out some stuff for you that you can try on."
"Just don't go with something too girly" you said as they walked away, wondering if they heard you.
"Leave it to us!" she waved.
121122112211121121111222222112212111.title: At the mall

1211221122111211211112222221122121111.content:
After a while of waiting they got back, both of them carrying a chunk of clothes. To you it seemed like they had brought half the store with them. Panties, bras, jeans, tights, leggings, skirts, dresses, you name it.

Emma said "Here you go, miss" as she unloaded one of the piles in front of you. "Are you really expecting me to try all of that?"
"Just try some stuff and leave the rest. You have to buy the underwear if you try it on, though."
Olivia put down an equally big pile with clothes next to Emma's.

"That's a start. Have you pick!" You didn't even know where to start. To even make a choice among what girl clothes to try on was too awkward for you to deal with, not to mention doing it in front of your friends.
"Awww, she's shy" Olivia teased.
"Just ignore her" Emma said. "Just pick something! We're here to help you. You're not a boy, there's nothing wrong with trying on girl clothes"
"You're wearing an outfit already, it's nothing to be ashamed of" Olivia dropped the sarcasm for the moment and sounded more encouraging.

"I don't know. What do you think I should try first?" you asked.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111.title: They got back with a pile of clothes

choices: You took a look at the bras and panties
12112211221112112111122222211221211111.content:
"Put these on" Emma handed you what appeared to be some leggings, jeans and some shorts.
You made your way to the changing room, they stayed outside.

You already had a pair of jeans on, so you thought you'd start with the leggings. You removed the tight denim pants (with a bit of struggle) and picked up the black leggings instead.

You expected it to sort of be of the same type. Way too tight, shaping itself to your body, way too obviously "there". Instead, you actually found them to be rather comfortable. The smooth fabric against your hairless legs was pretty tight, but not uncomfortably so. You looked in the mirror. You looked pretty cute. Your hips were wider than your usual body. The sway of the curves matched that of the clothing. The slightly elastic fabric sort of tracked your movements, giving off the sensation that you were basically wearing nothing at all. You found it to be a nice feeling in comparison with the rough and tight jeans you had been sporting so far. Not that the jeans were bad, but it was nice to let your legs "breathe".

You kind of hated how okay you were with wearing these.
You moved on to the shorts.

These were less elastic. They weren't denim, they were some sort of cotton. They were gray, with two strings in the front to tighten the waist. The rim of them had a white lining to them. "Must be some sort of gym-shorts" you assumed. At least it looked like what some of the girls at school wore during gymclass.

You removed the leggings and put them in a new pile on the side for stuff you deemed "okay" to wear.
You began pulling the shorts up and turned back to face the mirror. At least they looked good on you. Which you weren't so sure you liked.
They stopped a little under your butt, outlining the middle part of you body. Though they weren't as tight as the jeans or the leggings, they clearly outlined a V-shape in your crotch to remind you of your change.

"Hey, how's it going in there?" you heard one of the girls shout.
"Okay, I suppose" you said.
"Find anything yet?"
"Leggings weren't half bad. Don't make me look too masculine, though"
"That's the point, sweetie" they laughed.
They had never called you sweetie before. Adam, yes. Jenkins, yes. Sweetie? That was a first. You weren't sure you liked it.
12112211221112112111122222211221211111.title: Leggings, jeans, shorts

121122112211121121111222222112212111112.content:
You picked up a bra and realised you had to take you top off and although you felt naked you tried on the bra and the girl's got the right size and it felt ok you guess then the panties and again they felt fine.

You the redressed and decided to try on the jeans the girl's had picked a few pairs for you to try and after trying them on you decided to pick the bootleg and straight leg jeans.

You walked out and said I've decided that I'll take the underwear (bra and knickers) some of the leggings, shorts and the boot leg and straight leg jeans.

Emma and Olivia looked and each other and said for a guy your have a goid sense of dress although I'm not going to try the thongs.

The girls laughed and said we don't blame you.

By the way i told Jacob my name is Annie "cute name" the girl's said in unison "fuck you both" i had a split second to think and said that.

Well Annie we still have a few things to do, like what? You need to....
121122112211121121111222222112212111112.title: You took a look at the bras and panties

12112211221112112111122222211221211112.content:
Olivia handed you an assortment of various dresses and skirts. "Really?" you said.
"Yup! Have fun!" she said, leading you into the changing room.

So there you were. A high school girl, with your friends, at the mall, shopping clothes.
You held up one of the dresses. It seemed more every day use rather than something you'd wear to prom. You sighed as you began to unzip your jeans and remove your shirt. You looked in the mirror. You still think you were pretty cute for a girl. Which sucked. It didn't exactly make you feel very masculine.

You took the dress, glanced at it and pondered for a minute. Do you step into it? Do you put it on from the bottom and up? Eh, I'll just try something. You put it on, managed to fit it over your breasts and then tried pulling up the zipper. It was a white sundress with little blue flower on them.

"Have you got something on?" you heard from outside.
"Yeah" you replied.
To your surprise Emma just barged in.
"HEY, a little privacy please?" you said.
"Keep your panties on" she said as she glanced at you. You hated that. That's what Marie said when you confronted her this morning. Emma however wasn't like Marie. Emma said it with a smile, a sparkle in her brown eyes. "You look pretty cute" she said.
You acknowledged that it was a compliment, but you didn't know what to think of it.
"How does it feel?" she said.
"Breezy" you replied.

It was. It was more open and free than any guy clothes you had worn. Nothing that hindered movement. It felt pretty good, to be honest. If you ever got back to normal, maybe you should invest in buying a kilt.

"Do you like it?" she smiled, stroking the white cotton fabric.
"It's okay. I don't think I'll be able to find anything truly comfortable looking like this"
"Just give it some time. You're still new to this stuff! You'll like it eventually, I promise"
"Let's hope I don't have to stay this way long enough for that to happen" you said.

She nodded. "Hey, try on the skirt. I'll head out while you change" she said as she left the dressing room.
You stepped out of the dress and once again found the long haired cute girl staring back at you in her underwear. You picked up a loose red skirt and slid it up your legs. Not bad.
Finally nothing tight or revealing. It felt breezy, it felt sort of good. It looked pretty good as well. You didn't have anything on your upper body aside from the bra, but still. The dress was kind of tight in that area, lining your waist and revealing cleavage in your chest area. A regular skirt could be matched with basically anything.

"Hey" you heard. "Should we send in something else?"
12112211221112112111122222211221211112.title: Dresses, skirts

121122112211121121111222222112212111121.content:
I didn't really have time to reply before Olivia had thrown a lump of stuff over the closed drapes. It landed with a thud on the floor.
"There you go!"
I bent down and picked it up. Bathing suits. BATHING SUITS. For crying out loud, Olivia.
"Why, would I have to wear one of these?"
"Eventually, you're going to have to start coming to school. There's gymclass at school"

I was hoping I didn't have to be stuck like this for so long people would start to question the sick-at-home thing.

I think probably every guy has at some point been curious what it would be like to be a girl for a day. You know, not in a weird way, just thinking of how it would be different. The thought has probably crossed girls minds as well, no doubt. Standing there now, being a girl for the second day in a row, picking up different kinds of clothes was weird. It was a combination of male curiosity as well as a sense of reluctance. Just because the thought of how being the opposite sex would feel on some rare occassion (I'm a male teenager, don't judge me) it didn't mean I actually wanted to be one.

I rummaged through the small pile of different bathing suits. Nothing too girly, I thought. I picked up some bikini's, putting them back as I had no idea how you get the bra-part on. I pulled out a black one piece bathing suit and held it out in front of me, stepped in, and pulled it up. The straps over my shoulders, adjusting what needed to be adjusted and took a step back. Fit like a glove.

Like I've mentioned loads of times already, my physique was drastically different. Thinner waist, more shapely, extra filling in places, you know?
And lack of.. filling, in other places. The fabric going around that area covered everything as well, went up around the back and sort of stopped mid-back as the shoulderstraps begun forming.

I think this is one of the things I had (admittedly) been curious as what it would be like to wear. Felt good, I admit.
Do I like having to wear this stuff? Nu-uh.
121122112211121121111222222112212111121.title: Bathing suits

choices: You went home to one of the girls
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
We stayed in the store for another hour or so, the girls browsing through different stuff while I had to try it on. After a while they thought I had gathered up enough pants, tops, skirts, dresses, shirts, bras, panties and so on to make it through a while. Of course it wasn't enough if I were to be stuck like this forever, but it was a start. It was also on the verge of being too generous for my bank account. The stuff I had piled up was nothing too fancy either, just your everyday stuff. At least according to Emma and Olivia.

It got me thinking, what would I do if I woke up a boy again? I'd have a bunch of girl clothing lying in my wardrobe. That would probably have to require some explanation.

As we made our way to the register, they proceeded to pay for some stuff they picked up as well. They didn't seem too embarassed that I was there with them. We were friends, of course - but I was still a guy at heart. This was the first time me or any of the guys had been with them as they paid for newly acquired underwear.

It was my turn now. I walked up to the woman sitting at the register. She was probably in her late twenties, smiling at me as she scanned each of the items. I know I don't look my usual self, but I was still waiting for some sort of reaction. "Excuse me sir, but I think you're in the wrong aisle!" Instead she just smiled at me, told me the total and handed me the bags.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Leaving the store

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
Exiting the store, the girls (me included) game to a halt. "So what now?" they said. I know what I wanted, I wanted to go home. Lay down in my couch, watch a movie or something and ignore the fact that I just spent the remainder of my money buying skirts.
"Why don't we go home to my place?" Olivia suggested. "My parents aren't home"
Emma didn't have any other plans, so she agreed. I tried to decline, it had been a long day with a lot of adjustments and I had a feeling I was going to be the main topic if I went.

"Come on" Emma said. "It'll be fun!"
"You won't have to stay for long, it's only like an hour till dinner anyways"

I think Emma and I had different ideas of what was to be considered "fun", but next thing I knew I found myself walking alongside them on my way to Olivia's house.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: You went home to one of the girls

choices: You walked up to Olivia's room
You stayed in the living room
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
I'd been over at Olivia's place before, Emma's too actually. It wasn't far from school, but on the opposite end of where I live. It was two story white house, two floors and a wooden fence in the front yard. Aside from her parents, she also had a little brother. He was only ten, but he was pretty cool. Michael and I sometimes played video games with him when we were over.

We went up the gravel path and waited for a minute by the door as Olivia fiddled with her pockets, trying to find the keys. After hearing a *click*, we went inside.
Her parents were indeed out, but Charlie (her brother) wasn't. "Hello?" he said, the voice coming from the living room. We removed out shoes and left the bags by the door. We walked in to find him watching Spongebob in the sofa. "Helloo" Olivia replied, kissing her brother on the cheek. He immediately wiped it off.

"What are you doing home? I thought you were going with mom and dad" she said.
"I asked if I could stay at home. Where were you by the way? I thought you got off school like two hours ago" Charlie looked up at his sister.
"I went out shopping with some friends. Wanna see?"
"What did you buy?" he said, turning his gaze back at the yellow sponge.
"Clothes!" she said, cheerfully.
"No, I'm good" he shivered.

Charlie's gaze turned to me. "Who are you?" he said. My heart began pounding. She grabbed my shoulder and said "She's a friend" as she sort of pulled me into a half-one armed hug.

"Okay whatever" he said.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: At the house

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
"First time I've seen him so anti-social" I said as we were walking up the stairs.
"Get used to it" Olivia laughed.
"What's that supposed to mean?"
"Adam, face it. You have cooties" Emma smiled and nudged me in the shoulder.
I suppose it made sense. Charlie was only 10. To be fair, I could still be a bit awkward around girls myself.
Ironic, isn't it?

Olivia's room was the second one down the hall. She has a window overlooking the front of the house, right above the front door. The walls and the curtains are all white, a queen sized bed in the mid-left, closet on the right and a desk with a mirror above it on the opposite end of the bed. She also had a whole-body mirror standing just on the right of the door.

Emma sat down, cross legged in the bed. Olivia next to her, but lay down and stretched out her arms. I walked over and took a seat in the desk chair. There were some sketches on the table. Olivia was quite good at drawing, actually. I remember back in school when she used to draw portraits of people. I myself didn't really, as they say, have "the gift". Most of what I drew looked like regular stickmen. Cause they were in fact, stickmen.

There was a short period where nobody said anything. Not an awkward silence or anything, just, silence. I was the first one to speak up. "How do you feel about all of this?"
Olivia turned her head. "About what?"
"This whole thing. Waking up looking like this scared the life out of me. It's gotta be weird for you too, right?"
Emma snorted. "Yeah, of course. I thought I was going mental when I met you at school"
"Then why do you seem so.. calm, about it?"

Olivia sat up. She had a calm look on her face. It was one of those few times where she was completely serious. "Of course it's weird for us. It's not an easy thing to believe. You're our friend and I can see how freaked out this is making you. We just wanna help you cope, that's all."

"Exactly. Trust us, it's gonna take some getting used to for us as well, but we'll definetely help you any way we can. We've got a lifetime of knowledge" she winked.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: You walked up to Olivia's room

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
"Speaking of which" Emma said, pointing a finger at me. "You need an official new name"
"Yeah I sort of got the feeling Adam wouldn't be fitting anymore" I replied.
"Got any ideas?"
"Not really. I think I panicked and called myself Annie when Jacob called, but whatever."
"Annie? Where'd you get that from?"
"I don't know, I panicked" I found myself cracking a smile.
"I don't really think you look like an Annie" Olivia said.

Personally I didn't really like the idea of having to find a new name for myself. Somehow that would complete the whole thing. The body, the clothes and the name. One complete ga'l.

"Name ideas for miss Jenkins..." Emma mumbled to herself. She was on her phone, tapping on the screen. By the looks of it, she was probably on some website with a big list of names.
"Do you want anything closer to Adam?" she said without looking up.
"I don't know. Maybe?"

"What about Amy?" she said. "Amanda, Anna?"
" What about Emelie?" I said. I don't really know where I got it from. Just seemed ike a decent name. Throwing stuff out there, you know?
"Sounds a bit too close to Emma, don't you think?" Olivia asked.

"What do you think, Emma?" I shot her a look as she lifted her gaze from the phone. "Huh? Oh I don't care. If you like it then go for it" she said and smiled at me.
A person's name was a big thing. If I chose it I'd be stuck with it.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Continue

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
"I don't know, what do you guys think?" Emma and Olivia glanced at me from the bottom up "It kind of suits you" Olivia said. "Are you okay with it?"
I shrugged. It didn't seem that bad. Emelie was a pretty name. As long as no one else but them knows I suppose I have an opening to change it if I want. "Sure, let's go with that" I said.

"Emelie Jenkins" Olivia tried it out. "Not bad" There was a short pause afterwards. I broke the silence and asked what the plan was now.
"Don't you ever have any plans yourself?" Emma asked.
I really didn't. Something I was dreading was the fact that I had to start attending school. That part freaked me out.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Emelie

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
It was getting close to dinner time so Emma and I decided to go home.
We put our shoes on, got our bags and walked together down the street for a while before going seperate ways. She waved and told me to call either of them if something was up. It was pretty cool to have this kind of support from two of your closest friends whom you would expect to be a little more taken aback by all of this.

As I got home I found that Jacob had indeed left the backpack hanging on my door handle. Thankfully someone else hadn't walked along and snatched it. Then again, who'd want to steal a bag of homework?

I opened the door, put down the bag in the hall, kicked off my shoes and put the bags of clothes in my room. While I put some leftovers in the microwave for dinner I poured everything out on my bed and started sorting the items. I was gonna have to make additional room in my closet. I pulled out a bunch of clothes I obviously didn't have need for right now. Boxers, for example. I left everything there was space left over for. I didn't have a humungus stash of girl clothes, so there was no need to empty the whole thing. The pile I no longer needed, I crammed into a compartment above the wardrobe.

I put in the newly acquired arrays of panties, jeans, leggings, tops, bras, dresses and skirts, folding everything neatly as I did. Okay, maybe I was a bit too much of a perfectionist for a guy when it came to sorting my clothes, but I'm not really a guy now, am I?

I was hoping no one else would find a reason to look in my closet. This would take a biiit of explaining, regardless if Adam was here or not. There was a *ding* coming from the kitchen, which meant dinner was ready. I pulled out the plate and sat down in front of the TV. At least my appetite hadn't diminished. Quite the contrary, I felt quite hungry. It had been a hectic day.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Go home

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
I lay down after dinner and watched another episode of How I Met Your Mother. Felt nice to just lay back and relax.
Later I got up and did the dishes. I sniffed my armpit. I could probably use a shower.

This was gonna be a big step. It would be the first time I'd be completely butt naked. I wasn't even sure how to clean... certain things. I got into the bathroom and lost the jeans, the underwear and the top. I wasn't even wearing a bra as I hadn't acquired one until today. I stepped in and saw my own reflection on the mirror above the sink on the opposite side of the room. My hair was a bit messier and dirtier than yesterday. I had no idea how to manage this length. Heck, I didn't even own a comb.

I had goosebumps all over because of the chilly room, but as the water started drippling I suddenly found myself falling into relaxation in the cozy warm shower. Alright, this wasn't so different, I thought. Just water dripping in different places, I thought. It occured to me that I still had guy shampoo. It didn't really matter to me personally, but it was slightly odd to have this cute girl smell like a man.

I had to use like three times the amounts of shampoo I normally do. Usually I just grab a click and rub it in and let it run off. Since my hair was so long now it all just became a tangly mess with the hair at the furthest down my shoulders missing out on a lot of the action. I mean, I was washing my hair, it wasn't rocket science. It was just more troublesome than usual.

I covered the rest of my body in soap and let it rinse off. This was the first time I had fully had a feel of things, so to speak. My skin was wayy softer and certain attributes were shaped differently. My butt and hips for example had a more portruding shape and I really felt how my waist was much slimmer, bending inwards to that stereotypical hourglass-y figure.

I stepped out of the shower and dried myself up. The hair now looked like a tangly bush. I did my best trying to straighten it out but it wasn't easy trying to compensate your fingers for a comb.

Mental note: Get shampoo. Get a comb. I opened the bathroom cabinet. "- Also, get girl deoderant" I thought and closed it again.

The door was closed of course, but I still carried the towel wrapped around me. Now placed higher up to cover extra body parts that hadn't been a problem before.
As I went into my room I opened the wardrobe and tried to pick some new outfit. I now had more to choose from than my sisters jeans. I didn't know until today how many different styles of female underwear there were, not to mention the materials they came in. Boyshorts, hipster, string, briefs, bikini, thong. Of course I hadn't gotten everything, I just picked out stuff that didn't seem too overly feminine or too uncomfortable. No thongs.

I picked up a pair of bikini-styled panties and pulled them up. It perfectly cupped my anatomy and the flatness of my groin as it also covered my butt.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Go take a shower

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
I put on a pair of black leggings. Don't mock me when I say I think they're really comfortable. It's just so easy to move in them and it practically feels like I'm wearing nothing. I pulled out a bra as well and hesitated. It was just a regular white plain one, but I had no experience in putting one on and pondered whether I actually needed one. I decided to at least attempt to put one on as I had nothing better to do. So far so good. Getting the straps over my shoulders and the cups on my breasts was nothing compared to hooking the darn thing in the back. It took several attempts before I finally heard the click of it being set in place. I again stood in front of the mirror and adjusted it a bit before pulling out a top of the same color and putting it on.

The male part of my brain liked the look of this girl. Cute outfit and pretty cute looks, aside from my long brown hair that had now dried and was pointing in almost every direction. It hadn't really occured to me before how I had the opportunity to see a cute girl in her underwear whenever I wanted. Of course it was a different thing when the girl was indeed yourself, but still a pretty good thought.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Jeans/leggings and a top

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
I decided to try something new. Or well, to be fair, all of this was new. I picked out one of the skirts I had gotten and pulled it up my waist. It was beige and had a bit rough fabric and no elastic waistband. I went a bit back and forth, staring at the couple of frilly bras sitting there on a shelf. I'd just be at home, so there wouldn't really be any need for it, would it?

Then again, I had no idea how to even put one on so I might as well make an attempt as I have nothing better to do tonight. I picked up a pink lace one and shivered as I put the straps over my shoulders and tried to get my breasts to fit into the cups. It was surprisingly painstaking to hook the back. I'd had girlfriends so it wasn't my first time seeing a bra, however I didn't feel experienced enough to do it from this point of view. "Got it!" I exclaimed as I heard the slight click of the clasp.
The bra was surprisingly helpful. It eased on the weight of my breasts that had previously just 'hung freely' and constrained them in the girly chest-piece. I chose a tight white t-shirt with a v-neck to go on top. Aside from the drying mess that currently was my hair, I didn't look too shabby. I looked a bit in the mirror, turning different angles to check how the outfit looked. This wasn't as much for the sense of fashion as it was male curiosity of seeing a pretty girl in these clothes. It hadn't quite occured to me how I have easy access to see a cute girl in her underwear (or whatever clothes I wanted, for that reason) at any time.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Skirt/dress

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
The rest of the night went by surprisingly normal. I finished the homework Jacob had brought over and spent the rest of the evening playing GTA on my Playstation.
Just to get my mind off things, you know?

As I went to bed, I removed the skirt and the shirt and crawled into bed. First I struggled to get the bra on, now I had to struggle to get the thing off. I went to sleep only in my underwear.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Go to bed

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
It had practically become my routine in the morning as I woke up to immediately look down the covers to see if this female nightmare was still ongoing. It was. Hello boobs, I thought as I sat up. I stretched, went to the bathroom and did my thing, ate some breakfast and continued on as if nothing had changed.

I had forgotten my phone on the table the previous night and noticed I had received a text from Emma only five minutes ago asking if I plan on going to school today.
I did not want to go to school today. However, it might be better to pull the bull by its horns instead of hiding until my parents got home from their trip and found out I had been playing sick. I texted back a "yes" and only a minute later there was a knock on the door. As I looked through the peephole I discovered that it was in fact Emma. She must've been close to my place when she received my text.

I must've lost track on time because I hadn't even gotten dressed yet. I opened the door a tiny smidge and said "Can you wait outside a sec? I'm still in my underwear"
"Oh I don't care" she said. I cared. I didn't want her to see me walking around in panties. "Don't be such a baby" she laughed and before I knew it she had let herself in. I quickly grabbed a pillow and covered my chest. "EMMA! A LITTLE PRIVACY PLEASE?"

"Adam, or wait- what was it? Emelie? it's not awkward for a girl to see her friend in her underwear, relax. Just go get dressed and we'll go."
"Fine" I didn't remove the pillow. I just snuck into my room and began putting on the skirt and top again. I walked back out. "No bra?" she said.
"Sh*t" I said, looking down at my chest. I walked back into my room. It was easier this time.

"May I asked what's going on with your hair?" She ran it through her fingers "It's a mess".
"Plus you smell like dude" she said. "I don't have a bunch of feminine hygiene products, Em. We just bought clothes, remember?"
"Man, I'm gonna have to teach you a lot, aren't I?"

She stuck her palm in one of her pockets in her jacket and pulled out a ribbon. "Turn around" she said. I did as I was told. I felt my hair being pulled back as she did something to it. A minute later she stopped and said "There! Go look"

She had made my hair into a long thick braided ponytail. "Thanks" I said. I probably don't think it came out as thankful as it should have. It looked better now, of course, although a comb wouldn't have hurt either. It just kept dawning on me how girly I actually was.

"Ready to go now?" she said.
I nodded.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Tomorrow morning

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
As we got to school, Emma ran over to a group of girls standing by the entrance. Some greeted her, some gave her a hug. I looked around as if I were some lost kid unsure of where to go. I glanced over at the group of guys sitting at the tables some distance away and thought their side looked more fun than the giggling girl side I was currently at.

Emma waved me over and I reluctantly made my way over there.
"Guys, this is Emelie" she said, leading me into the group with her hand on my back. There were a mixed array of girls here. Sofia was a senior, Juliet was in her first year. There were some familiar faces and some I don't recall meeting before. I knew of course the usual ones from my own class. Elaine, Pam, Johanna and Amy. Marie was thankfully not here. She had her own group of friends.
"Emelie, huh? Emelie what?" Sofia asked.
"Jenkins" I said.
"Oh, so you're related to Adam then?" said Pam.
"Yes" I hadn't thought this thing through. Same last name, I obviously couldn't lie and say I was my own girlfriend. Great job dingus.
"They're cousins" Emma filled in, sounding surprisingly convincing.

"Ah, nice! So you're going to start our class, then?" Pam asked.
"Yeah, I suppose so"

At that moment Olivia showed up. She had clearly been running. I don't really get how she can live this close to school and yet almost always arrive right before school begins. "Hey!" she started, breathing heavily between words. "Oh, I see you've met Emily?"
"Yup. How do you know her?"
"Em and I took her shopping yesterday"

Well she didn't have to go around and say that, I thought.
The bell rang shortly after and the crew disbanded. Sofia and Juliet went their own seperate ways, the rest of the girls started walking to our classroom. "Come, Emelie" Johanna said, signing me to follow them.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: At school

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
I followed the girls, pretending I hadn't already gone to this school for two years. Well it actually was a bit different. These were different people, doing different things, talking about different stuff. I just sort of tagged along as I didn't really know how to be part of the conversations.

As we got to class my math teacher, Mrs. Lopez, had already arrived. "Come sit with us" Olivia whispered as we made our way to the back row. Me, Emma, Olivia and the rest of the girls from this morning.

Ms. Lopez took a notice of me as I was about to sit down. "Ah, is there a new student in this class?" she asked. Oh no. "Don't be shy, stand up and introduce yourself!" I slowly got back up and looked around the classroom. All eyes were on me. "Hello" I said, gently brushing my arm and removing a stroke of brown hair from my face. "My name is Emelie Jenkins. I'm Adam's cousin-" I looked over at the guys in front, who all looked at Jacob and appeared to be whispering something.
"- And will you be staying here for a while, Miss Jenkins?" Mrs. Lopez asked. I nodded.

"Well, the headmaster hasn't notified me about a new student, but you're more than welcome" she said and gestured me to sit back down.
She now turned her gaze elsewhere and spoke to the whole class. "Well I hope we can help Emelie here to feel at home" she said, then turned around to the whiteboard and began writing today's pages. "Don't worry dear, I'll go get you a book!" she said as the rest of the students began unpacking their stuff.

"No ma'am, that's okay-" I said and held out my own. "Adam said I could borrow his till he is well enough to come back"
"Oh. Okay then" she said and smiled.

I gave a silent sigh of relief.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Class

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
I made it through the rest of the class rather fine. Not a lot of talking, just sitting quietly doing math. I did however find a slight annoyance in that my boobs stood against the edge of the table as I tried to lean forward to read the questions. I also got some looks here and there both from guys and girls, probably just checking out the newcomer. At least I hope they weren't checking me out for different reasons.

As everyone left the classroom I was halted from accompanying Emma and Olivia when I felt someone tugging on the back of my shirt. It was Jacob, Dan and Michael. "Hey" Jacob said. "Can we talk to you for a sec?"

Oh no. Oooooh no. "Actually, I was just about to-" I got interrupted as they led me into an empty corridor.
"Who are you?" said Michael.
"What do you mean?" I said, playing dumb. This whole thing was too embarassing to come out with at a time like this.
Jacob started speaking. "I've talked to you twice before. The first time you said your name was Annie. Now it's suddenly Emelie"

"Oh shoot, he remembered" I thought.

"Then, you said you were Adam's girlfriend. Now, you're apparently his cousin. Do you agree with me when I say that this doesn't add up?"
I looked away. I stayed silent.
"Yesterday you were here with his backpack to 'get his homework'. I offered to do it for you, but when I got there, his apartment was locked."

Dan and Michael were standing behind me. "We're Adam's friends. We just want to know what the heck is going on, so spill it, who. are. you?"
I didn't know what to do. I looked around, Dan and michael still behind me, arms crossed. I couldn't just run off. Not that I was afraid they were going to beat me up or anything, but I saw no way out.

"She's Adam" a voice came from further down the corridor. It was Emma and Olivia.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: After class

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
"Em?" Jacob said confused.
I sighed and closed my eyes. This was it.
"What did you just say?" Dan looked at her.

"She said Emelie is actually Adam" Olivia said as they walked towards us.
"What do you mean she's Adam?" All three of them looked confused.
"Well think about it. Have you ever seen both of them at once, Jacob?" Emma said.
"Well no, but that doesn't mean- we've basically only just met her"

I remained silent. I didn't say anything. I just looked down at the floor.
The girls continued to explain the details of, at least what we knew, had happened.
"Em, people don't just magically switch genders. It's not possible" Dan said.

"It was Marie who did it" Olivia replied.
"Marie? What does she have to do with this?"
"It's true. Guys, I overheard her talking about it." Emma said in a serious tone.

Olivia grabbed my arm and led me closer to them. "Dan, just look into her eyes and tell me she doesn't look like Adam." He looked confused, but did what she said. I chose to look in another direction as to avoid cheer awkwardness.

"She actually kind of does" he said, "but that doesn't prove anything." I sighed and opened my mouth for the first time during this whole conversation. "Guys, it's true. I don't know how she did this, but I really am Adam"

Both Jacob and Michael walked over so they too could get a better glimpse of my girlish face.
"Dude.." Michael said, taking a step back. "Is it actually you, man?"

"More or less" I said and gave a light chuckle.
"I'm still not sure" Jacob said doubtingly.

I was growing impatient. This was the third time I'd have to convince someone. "Jacob, we've known each other for years, man. It's me. You used to carry around a teddybear at kindergarten called Barry. You cried because you dropped it in the mud and didn't want to tell your mother."
I turned to Michael. "You broke your brother's playstation and to avoid getting scolded you blamed me." - "and Dan, you secretly love watching romantic comedies"

"HEY" he said. "Oh relax, it's not like you're the most feminine person here right now" I said.
"He just told you he's gotten turned into a girl. He doesn't even have male genitalia yet he's got more balls than any of you" Emma said. Olivia burst out laughing.
I flashed a grin. That line stomped them.

The guys looked at each other. They knew I was the only one (well, up until now) who knew that stuff.
"So it's really you, man?" Jacob said.
"It's really me."
"You're pretty hot" Dan said.
"Shut up" I said.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Continue

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
The guys shot you weird glances during next class. I don't blame them, to be honest. If any of them just magically showed up at school as the opposite sex one day I'd probably have a few questions myself.

I continued to sit next to Em and Olivia however, after all, I was one of the girls, weren't I?
As lunch came however, me, Dan, Michael, Jacob, Olivia and Emma all sat down at our own table.
"I still can't believe you're a girl." Dan was laughing. "So you have no idea how long you're stuck like this then?" Jacob asked. I shook my head. No clue.
"Wait, where did you get the clothes from?" he said, pulling the string on my bra.

"Hey, stop that" I said. He let go.
"We took her shopping" Olivia sniggered.
"YOU did? Wait, how long have you known?"
"Only since yesterday"
"And you just decided to take him- sorry, "her" shopping for clothes?"
"Basically, yeah." Emma teased them by making it seem like it was no big deal at all.

"And you were just okay with it, man? Tagging along to buy panties and crop tops?" They laughed.
"Hey, watch it" I didn't find this as amusing.

"Don't mind him" Olivia lay her arm around my neck. "Just ignore them. You're on the winning team now!"
"I'm sorry, but are you saying girls are better than boys?"
"Of course we are" she said, still her arm around my neck as if she was waiting for me to back her up.
"You people can't even pee standing up" Dan said.
"Coming from the guy who's probably seen more romantic comedies than me" she said, getting a haul of laughter from the rest of the table. She was obviously teasing him because she had a crush on him. She didn't know it, but I knew Dan had a crush on her too. It felt kind of nice being all out in the open with this now. No more sneaking about, no more secrets. My closest friends knew. That was enough.

"So 'Emelie', seriously. Being a guy is way better, right?"
"Oh you can't ask her that when she's only been a girl for like two days" Emma yelled.
I cut in. "Actually, not everything's that bad" I said, making both the girls smile.
" - I'll probably have to change clothes in the girls changing room now" I said and winked at the guys.
Em and Olivia both slapped me in the head.

"I was joking!" I said.
"Oh you're laughing now, Emelie Jenkins, but you weren't laughing yesterday when I made you put on a bathing suit" all of the guys burst out laughing.
"Actually, she thought it was pretty comfortable" Emma said to make things even worse.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Lunch

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content: Swimming or regular gym?
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Next class (Gym)

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
The guys laughed their asses off. I felt kind of embarassed. Thanks, Emma.
As we packed up our lunches and went out, I asked "By the way, what is our next class?"
"It's swimclass man. You know, gym?"
Oh no. I know I was joking about it earlier but I had no desire to step into the girls locker room. I hadn't even packed any clothes to go with it.
"Looks like we're all going to see your bathing suit soon" Jacob smirked. I punched me in the side. My heartrate was going up. I asked how long it was till then.

"Around 15 minutes" Dan said as he looked down at his wristwatch. "Why?"
"I don't have any gymclothes" I said.

To be honest I think the guys found the realization of my physical appearance a bit intimidating. They didn't really say anything, as if trying to ignore the fact that their friend now had a bathing suit. "You might make it if you run, Emelie" Emma said.

I guess I didn't have a choice. I left school and made my way back home. It took five minutes at this pace. I hurried to my bedroom and put the skintight one piece in a plastic bag along with a towel and put it back in my backpack. I think it even had the price tag still on. I wasn't in the height of physical strength to begin with, but in this body I noticed a slight hint of exhaustion that came sooner than expected. When I got back to school I had a little over five minutes to go, my heart pounding as I opened the door to the local gym.

Other students were still entering the different locker rooms, so it appeared I had still made it on time. I could see the guys up ahead and was almost on a verge of joining them before I felt Olivia tugging on my shirt. I sort of forgot I was a girl now. I looked over at the men's room in longing as I was being pulled into my own doom.

"Got any tips?" I whispered to Olivia.
"Haven't you ever been in a locker room before?"
"Yes, but this isn't my usual locker room" I said.
"I don't know how you guys do it, but we usually change our clothes before we go in"
"Great. Thanks" I responded.
"- But if I catch you staring at me while changing I will punch you in the face, got it?" Olivia pointed a finger threatingly at my chest.
I nodded respectfully.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: Swimming

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
It looked like the guys dressing room, only mirrored. The entrances are right next to each other, but the girls showers are on the right side, the lockers on the left, and so forth. It might be my imagination but it might also be a tad cleaner. At least it didn't reak as much of sweaty socks. My plan was simple. Find a place as far away from everyone else as possible, change quickly and walk out.

The backpack was swung across my shoulder as I made my way through the small stream of girls and settled for a place on the far right with a wall of lockers on the opposite side, as if to shield myself from the view of the others. - And to avoid a potential punch in the face if I happened to see Emma or Olivia.

Thank goodness I was flat down there right now. I was in a room full of hot girls my age who were beginning to remove their clothes in order to fit into their bikinis and bathing suits. Had I not been so nervous (or a girl myself) I would've been the luckiest guy in the world. I was pulled back to reality as a close thud eminated from the bench on the opposite side of mine.

"Hey" a girl said as she put down her backpack. "Why are you sitting here all alone?" she said. I knew her as one of Marie's friends. Patricia. She was a bit of a tomboy, but she was harmless. She had black hair and ripped jeans, often wearing a checkered shirt.
I didn't have time to answer before she started unbuttoning her shirt and said "You want to stay a bit out of sight as well?"
I nodded.
"You were that new girl right? Emilia or something?"
"Emelie" I said. I was sitting on the bench hugging my knees.
"Ah, nice to meet you Emelie. I'm Patricia" she stretched out her arm to greet me.
"Nice to meet you Patricia" I said, even though I'd been in her class for the past two years.
"You don't have to be shy, girl. I'm not embarassed"

She was obviously referring to me still not unpacking my stuff or even taking my shoes off. I tried to avoid her gaze by turning around as I, too, began slowly undressing.
It appeared as if Patricia knew anything about what Marie had done to me, so I didn't hold any grudges against her. Marie wasn't exactly that stereotypically evil girl herself, even though it might sound like it. I mean, I'm standing in the girl's locker room because of her. When we dated however, she was just like any normal girl. Cute, outgoing, nothing that said "If you ever dump me I'm going to curse you and turn you into a girl". Speaking of which, where was Marie? I hadn't seen her at all today.

I had my shirt off and tried to unhook my bra. Still turned towards the locker. "Uh, you need a hand?" Patricia asked as she saw me fumbling around trying to get it open. "No I'm good" I said. She took a step closer and swiftly just snapped it open. "There you go." she said. I felt embarassed over how poorly I was at being female. "I usually just go without one for that same reason" Patricia said with a smile. I had the towel covering my whole body as I sat down trying to get my pants and underwear off without showing anything off. It probably looked a bit weird, but I didn't care.

I stepped into the bathing suit and pulled the straps over my shoulders. I was fully dressed, but I still felt completely nude. I knew I was currently in a place only populated by girls and no one was ogling me for 'that' reason, but I was soon about to follow everyone else out to the pool.

As I walked out the teacher hadn't shown up yet, so everyone was sitting on the benches outside the locker rooms. I sat down between Olivia and Pam, just staring down at my own body to avoid glances from the boys. I don't know if anyone actually paid me any attention, but I didn't want to know if they did.
"See, that went fine" Olivia patted me on the arm.
"What went fine?" Pam asked me.
"You know, new kid at school, locker rooms?" Olivia replied for me.
"Don't worry, Emelie. You seem like a cool girl, although a bit quiet" she said and smiled at me. I forced a smile back.

"Good afternoon class!" a voice suddenly echoed from the other end of the pool as Mr. Steinberg walked in. He was a muscular man in his late 30's, hair shaved down to little stubbles and wearing black shorts and shirt. He wasn't as tough as he looked, actually he was a favorite among students. "Anyone missing today?"

"Adam Jenkins" shouted Dan from further down the line. Mr. Steinberg crossed off my name on a piece of paper. "Aaaalright, anyone else?" he looked up. Patricia raised her hand. "Marie Wilson. The flu"

So that's why I hadn't seen her today. Coach Steinberg crossed off another name and turned to face the class again. "Okay eveyone, this class I just want you to swim 10 lines and do some diving tests. Nothing major as today's class has to be cut short. I'm going on vacation in exactly 45 minutes." he said.

"Go on then, move it!" he shouted as all students got up from their seats and began jumping into the water.
1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.title: The changing room

1211221122111211211112222221122121111211.content:
I hadn't been a girl for very long, and I had only had one shower. I had never been in a class full of people wearing a one piece bathing suit ready to go swimming before. I looked down at the pool, watching my shivering reflection as I took a deep breath and jumped in. The water was kind of cold. The water went up to my shoulders as I landed on the bottom.

In the water, the bathing suit stuck to my skin even tighter and I really couldn't tell if I had accidentally left it with me as I jumped in or if I was still wearing it. I swung my wet brown hair back and began walking to the end of the pool, preparing to start the obligatory laps. I was splashed in the face by someone. Michael and Jacob dived up. Great.

"Hello young lady" Michael started as he shook his hair after leaving the water.
"Hello" I said, arms crossed in the freezing water.
"You really are wearing a one piece" Jacob laughed.
"Yes." I said, shortly.
"Isn't it like, uncomfortable, dude?"

I didn't know what to say. It actually wasn't. This wouldn't have been much less embarassing if my guy friends weren't mocking me and constantly reminding me that I was no longer male. "It's alright" I said.
"I don't think Emelie is very talkative right now" Michael told Jacob.
"Yeah, me neither. Well, see you later girl!" Jacob shouted before once again diving under the surface.
"Listen, don't take it too hard. We're just joking." Michael said and lay a hand on your hand before joining Jacob under the water.

I remained still by the edge of the pool for a while until Mr. Steinberg whistled in my direction and said "Hey, new girl. Let's see some swimming!"
I nodded, kicked off and dived under water. I sort of missed the feeling of swimming trunks that sort of floated around a bit like a yellyfish under water. At least you knew they were there. Swimming went pretty well, though. Surprisingly well. I hadn't been there for long before I was done with my ten laps and were free to do whatever I wanted. I just basically tested stuff out. Checking what different swimming techniques and positions were different when you were a girl.

Being under water was pretty cool as you were sort of "weightless", just floating around. My flat groin making itself pretty eminent as I was kicking with my legs while diving.

After class, we all hit the showers. This was an awkward bit I hadn't anticipated. I had to get nude here. There were no drapes between the showers, but rather just one big open area. I didn't make eye contact with anyone. I just closed my eyes, dropped the one piece and walked into the warm water. "I can do this" I thought. "It's just a shower. Ignore the fact that I'm standing in like with like ten other naked girls right now"
That last bit didn't help. Thank goodness I was a girl right now and not a boy, or it would've been pretty clear what I meant.

"Aren't you gonna wash your hair?" someone said next to me. A voice I recognized as Pam's. I still had my eyes closed. "Nah, I forgot my shampoo" I said.
"That's okay, you can borrow mine"
A hand stretched out in front of my face with a yellow bottle of shampoo. I didn't look in Pam's direction, just said "thanks" and began washing my hair. At least now I wouldn't smell like a dude, I thought.

After the shower, I wrapped the towel around my waist and walked back to the bench where I had left my clothes before. I put on the underwear again, struggled a bit before getting on the bra and made my way out, trying to not make too much eye contact, or.. otherwise.

You had continued going through your flat to see how extensive these changes were. Apparently, not much. Your name was different, the clothes in the closet were different, but aside from that the rest was pretty minor. Based on the photo albums and your phone contacts you still hung out with the same people. The photos were the same, only the pictures of you had been replaced by your female counterpart. It was like Adam Jenkins never existed. You had the same life, the same friends and the same family, only you were now the opposite sex.

You sat down in the sofa and rubbed your eyes. "Man, what a weird day" you sighed. You lay down, every shift in position resulting in a different sensation unlike what you were used to. It was just so unbelievably weird not feeling anything between your legs. Not to mention the sensation of feeling something you normally wouldn't on your chest. Even if you wanted to talk to someone about this, they wouldn't know anything was different. To them, you had always been Emily Jenkins.

Gyn-tech, a stylised pink oval inside a pyramid. The penalty for performing that on a real human is the death penalty. It's beyond an act of rebellion to ask for even a version of it. The ultimate crime for forcing it on anyone, denying them humanity and all the rights due a born human.

"It's... It's not real." you show it to Janice. Feverishly working your other thumb over and over it. Working to remove it, the joke, the make-up, the ... whatever. Alas, your flesh only reddens, and the mark remains stubbornly a tattoo identifying you absolutely as a gynoid.

"No... No!" You shift from uncertain to enraged in two words. "This has to be a trick... a trap... I'm human... I know I am..." you insist.

"I... think .... I think I was a man." you tell her nodding to yourself, as the pieces feel right, even if the final image is incomplete.

"I... I can't remember my name..." you confess, your words as lost as you feel.
142332242.title: "Please..." you beg, "What's your name?"

choices: There are vague, memories surfacing and vanishing.
There's something familiar about all of this...
The ships' klaxon starts blaring, and warning amber lights flash...
Janice breaks and whirls around, angrily answering all your questions.
1423322421.content:
With a tired wave of her arm, she indicates for you to follow her. She leaves without a backward glance. Racing after her, you stop at the door, dressed only in lingerie, you wonder what lies beyond the threshold.

The corridor is metallic, and Janice waits just beyond. Stepping through, she nods to it, and you close the door. It has a thick window, allowing you to see the scantily dressed women inside. Another humiliating reminder of your own precarious state.

Your fingers brush over the plate on the door labelling it 'Cargo Hold 15'

It's not even the end of the corridor, looking up and down, you see doors stretching in both directions, and opening on both sides of the passageway. Swiftly you do some mental arithmetic. You realise there are hundreds of gynoids in transit. Having read the sign, you feel, or imagine you do the gentle humm filling the air, the vibration of engines telling you that you're in flight.

"Come on, cutie..." Janice gives your ass an awkward pat, startling you into motion. She seems just as jumpy as you, keeping a few paces ahead of you, and out of reach of a revenge pat.

It left you wondering, if that's how she thought you should be addressed.

"I'm not a gynoid." you tell her. But the company logo silently calls you a liar.

She just snorts, and keeps walking. Tuning out your attempts at conversation as a mechanical or software defect. Mind still whirling with your own questions, you need some new ones.

"What's the ship?" you ask.

"Where are we... going?" you hesitate, avoiding a stutter. Is it we, or you? Do you count as a passenger, or cargo. Her silence feels deafening, and you detect a rising frustration or anger in her hips as she leads you further into the ship.
1423322421.title: "You're a gynoid.... You have a synthetic soul."

choices: All the bridge crew turn to take you in...
Humiliatingly, nervousness means a giggle burst from you.
When the captain turns to face you, there's another twinge of recognition.
You see a name plaque. The ship's name proudly displayed.
14233224212.content:
Something feels familiar about this whole situation. The layout of the ship is right. You seem to know which direction Janice is going to take before she reaches a corner. Or if she's going through or passing a door.

Frustratingly, nothing specific comes to mind. You want to remember any details or shape for these memories. Alas, nothing particular comes. The knowledge is without flavour, as if you've merely studied a manual, or are just familiar with ships in general.

Your hands brush over the walls as you walk. The plastisteel mix is reassuring. Hell, it's welcoming compared to the silent indifference of Janice, and her mute anger. Her refusal to engage in any conversation, or treat you as anything other than a problem she needs to solve.

From it's size, you recognise it as a cargo transporter. You scowl in frustration at Janice's back, that's something you knew. Hell! It was written on the door of the room where you woke.

- - - - -

Eventually, the walk ends. The destination feels right, not a surprising. Before you step through the door, you know that you're about to step onto the bridge.

The bridge spreads out in front of you as you enter. You see the Captain's chair in the middle, along one wall the control panels for engine status. The opposite side with its' scientific displays. In front of the captain, the pilot and navigator sit side by side. The front is dominated by a view screen.

"I found the source of the alarm, Captain." Janice indicates yourself.
14233224212.title: There's something familiar about all of this.

choices: Memories flood back, at the discovery of the rip.
The captain's conversation tails off, and you find them looking at you.
The captain wants you put back to sleep and returned to storage.
The pilot starts to behave strangely...
142332242123.content:
Breaking his gaze, you look to the floor plating. Feeling self-conscious just from your own over-ripe body. Being in front of all these men, and they are all men reminds you the lingerie is all the clothes you're wearing. The walk, trailing after Janice almost allowed you to forget that.

With the pair of them talking, you wander the bridge. Making sure to stay out of the way, you walk to the pilot's console. Ahead of you the view screen is filled with streaks of light. You're travelling through hyper-space at the moment. Looking across to the far console, you can see the navigator's display, but it's too acute an angle for you to read the destination.

Pretending none of the men is there, or looking at you... is hard work. But it's better for your mental health than admitting they're drooling at your presence, and stealing looks. The endless gawping as they take in your bust, and the reflections confirming that even from behind, they're still hooked to watching your rump.

A goal you can appreciate, the one memory that remains is one of being male. That's something you're certain of... even if you can't be certain, why you're certain of it.

Holding the pilot's headrest of the chair, your fingers find the cut sliced in the leather, while your nails dig it deeper.
142332242123.title: When the captain turns to face you.

choices: You read his name badge, "Yes... That's me. I'm Ensign Pulver." you state.
"The rest of the crew are still gynoid dolls." The captain informs you coldly.
You see a look of sympathy, maybe of empathy, on Janice's face.
You see a gynoid controller in the Captain's hands.
1423322421231.content:
As you look around, you see that the Captain and Janice are now watching you. Their looks are not leering, just concerned. The apathy of Janice is erased, and she's actually looking at you, with some curiosity. Her eyes flit back and forth between you and the captain.

Looking over the pilot's head, and console, you see you're still in hyper-space. His bald spot triggers another memory, and you glance from that to the cut in the headrest. A gasp of revelation spills from your lips, as pieces fall into place.

Hunkering to your knees, you take the pilot's chair, and whirl it around until he's facing you. Head to head, then eye to eye. It's his gaze that falters, as the last pieces fall into place.

"You're me... That's me... I mean I'm you.... That's... that's my body..." you stand up, on unsteady legs like a newbord deer as you back away from the stranger who's stolen your body. Backing into the console behind you, the cushiony ass reminds you of your current location, and the answering ripple of your bust, contained and displayed in your lingerie a counter to the chill waking effect of the cold metal pressing against your rump.
1423322421231.title: Memories flood back, at the discovery of the rip.

1431.content: Adam wakes up and slowly feels something wrong with his bed. It’s far more scratchy than he’s used to. He looks up and sees wooden rafters, to his left is a rough end table with a candle on it. He starts to get up and everything feels wrong.

info.brief_description: Turning into the "fairer sex" turns out to be not that fair after all.
info.description:
You are Adam Jenkins, a high school student who is about to experience the shock of his life. For one reason or the other, he will find himself cursed to live a a girl! He will have to endure the differences in clothes, culture, and body structure while he is cursed. A dream for TG fans!
